alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:28AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Orange County through 1230 PM EDT... At 1128 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middletown, moving northeast at 90 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Goshen, Howells, Florida, Unionville, Scotchtown, Mechanicstown, Westtown, Slate Hill, Pine Island, Circleville and New Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
